title: Analyse
snippet: Dissecting urban spaces to reveal the interconnected layers of functionality, design, and culture.
description: In urban analysis, breaking down the physical, social, and economic dimensions of spaces is essential. Analysis helps uncover connections between infrastructure, human behavior, and the built environment, paving the way for innovative urban interventions.
literature: Spatial Analysis: A Guide for Ecologists by Marie-Josée Fortin
Cities of Tomorrow by Peter Hall
The Image of the City by Kevin Lynch
